category: National Sports Competition Regulations/Article 4 (Number of Competitions)
contents: Article 4 (Number of Competitions) ① The number of times for the National Sports Festival and the National Winter Sports Competition is counted from the first competition held in 1920, and years in which the competition is not held due to unavoidable circumstances are also included in the number. Revised 2016. 6. 16., 2022. 1. 24. ② The number of National Youth Sports Competitions is counted from the first competition held in 1972, and years in which the competition is not held due to unavoidable circumstances are also included in the number. Newly established on June 16, 2016, January 24, 2022. ③ The number of times the National Sports Festival is calculated based on the actual competitions held since the first competition held in 2001. Newly established 2016. 6. 16., 2022. 1. 24.
